
\definemathcommand [lcm]     [limop] {\mfunction{lcm}}
\definemathcommand [argmax]  [limop] {\mfunction{arg\,max}}
\definemathcommand [argmin]  [limop] {\mfunction{arg\,min}}

\definemathcommand [E]  [limop] {\mfunction{E}}
\definemathcommand [Var]  [limop] {\mfunction{Var}}

\definemathcommand [det]  [limop] {\mfunction{det}}
\definemathcommand [rank]  [limop] {\mfunction{rank}}

\define[1]\ceil{{\left\lceil #1 \right\rceil}}
\define[1]\floor{{\left\lfloor #1 \right\rfloor}}

\setupmathematics[
  functionstyle=\rm\bf,
  %functioncolor=,
  %textstyle=,
  %textcolor=,
]

%% workaround for vdots
\ifdefined\vdots
\else
 \define\vdots{%
  \rotate[rotation=90]{\ldots}%
 }
\fi
